amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study and develop a plan for the removal of invasive salt cedar.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3869 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3869 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2409-2410) To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study and develop a plan for the removal of invasive salt cedar.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3869 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3869 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3801.
